CommandDefinition.Name: cleanupxmomrepository
CommandDefinition.Description: Removes old entries from xmomrepository (used to view old order audits)

Argument.Name: ageInDays
Argument.Description: Remove entries that are older than this age (in days) and are not currently needed. All audits created later on can still be viewed.

BoolOption.Name: F
BoolOption.Description: Do not create a backup of the xmomrepository in /tmp
